ca.ualbert.cs.tasko

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualbert.cs.tasko.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a task object. Contains the name of the task (max 40 characters), its description (max 350 characters), the photos attached to it, its geolocation, the ID of the user who requested the task, ID of the user who provided the task as well as it's current status which can be one of requested, bidded, assigned or done.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Task(java.lang.String taskRequesterID, java.lang.String taskName, java.lang.String description)
      Basic constructor of a task object that contains all the required information for any task object which is the userID of the task requester, name of the task and the tasks description.
      Task(java.lang.String taskRequesterID, java.lang.String taskName, java.lang.String description, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> photos)
      More advanced constructor of a task object that contains all the required information for any task object which is the userID of the task requester, name of the task and the tasks description as well as the photos attached to this task.
      Task(java.lang.String taskRequesterID, java.lang.String taskName, java.lang.String description, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> photos, com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng location)
      Complete constructor of a task object that contains all the required information for any task object which is the userID of the task requester, name of the task and the tasks description as well as the geolocation for this task and the photos attached to this task.
      Task(java.lang.String taskRequesterID, java.lang.String taskName, java.lang.String description, com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng location)
      More advanced constructor of a task object that contains all the required information for any task object which is the userID of the task requester, name of the task and the tasks description as well as the geolocation for this task.

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)

        Parameters:
